name: MUHAMMAD HASANUZZAMAN
details: Muhammad Hasanuzzaman is a Barrister-at-Law (Lincoln’s Inn, UK) and an Advocate of the Supreme Court of Bangladesh. He brings extensive legal expertise to his practice, with an academic foundation built on an LLB (Hons) from Northumbria University. His career reflects a strong commitment to excellence in legal advocacy and client service.

name: MD. SIRAJUL ALAM BHUIYAN
details: Md. Sirajul Alam Bhuiyan is an Advocate of the Supreme Court of Bangladesh with a distinguished academic background, holding both MSS and LLB degrees from the University of Dhaka. With years of experience, he has established himself as a respected legal professional dedicated to upholding justice.

name: SHAKIR UDDIN AHMED BAPPY
details: Shakir Uddin Ahmed Bappy is a Barrister-at-Law (Lincoln’s Inn, UK) and an Advocate of the Supreme Court of Bangladesh. He holds an LLB (Hons) from the University of London and is recognized for his sharp legal acumen and professional dedication to the field of law.

name: Anaan Haque
details: Anaan Haque is an Advocate of the Supreme Court of Bangladesh with an academic background in law, holding an LLB (Hons) from the University of London. With a strong foundation in legal practice, he is committed to advancing client interests with professionalism and integrity.

name: JAKARIA KHAN
details: Jakaria Khan is an Advocate of the Supreme Court of Bangladesh. He earned his LLB (Hons) from the University of Stamford and has since built his career on sound legal principles and effective advocacy, demonstrating a strong passion for the practice of law.

name: Poonam Parvez
details: Poonam Parvez is a legal professional with international academic credentials. She holds an LL.B (Hons) from Anglia Ruskin University, UK, and an LL.M from Northumbria University, UK. Her diverse legal education equips her with a comprehensive understanding of both local and international legal frameworks.

name: TARIQUL ISLAM
details: Tariqul Islam is an Advocate of the District Court, Dhaka, with a solid academic foundation from the University of Dhaka, where he completed both LLB (Hons) and LLM. His work demonstrates a deep commitment to legal service and community justice.
institute: LLM, and LLB (honors), University of Dhaka

name: MD. ZAFUR MIAH
details: Md. Zafur Miah is an Advocate of the District Court, Dhaka. He earned his LLB and LLM from Daffodil International University. His practice reflects diligence and a steady pursuit of justice in district-level litigation and legal affairs.

name: Tanjila Kabir
details: Tanjila Kabir is a Barrister-at-Law and legal professional with international qualifications. She completed the BPTC at the University of the West of England, UK, strengthening her skills in advocacy and litigation. She is committed to excellence in legal service.
institute: BPTC, University of West England, UK

name: Lamisha Shehrin Sikder
details: Lamisha Shehrin Sikder is a legal practitioner holding an LL.B (Hons) from the University of London, UK. With her academic background and dedication, she continues to grow her career in the legal profession, contributing her expertise to diverse legal matters.

name: RUMAIYA HUQ
details: Rumaiya Huq is a Barrister-at-Law and a dynamic legal professional with international exposure. She earned her LLB (Hons) from the University of London and pursued further legal training through the PgDL at City Law School, City University, London. Her strong academic background complements her practice as an Advocate.
service: PgDL, City Law School, City University, London, UK
